text: Paul Eugene Foytack (November 16, 1930 â€“ January 23, 2021) was an American professional baseball player and right-handed pitcher. He appeared in 312 games in Major League Baseball between 1953 and 1964 for two American League clubs, the Detroit Tigers and the Los Angeles Angels. He was born in Scranton, Pennsylvania. Foytack died on January 23, 2021 in Spring Hill, Tennessee at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Sportspeople from Scranton, Pennsylvania
title: Paul Foytack
